record.title: PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR
record.narrative:
PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR -- (Senate - April 24, 2008)

[Page: S3411]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that Jeryle Greene and Mindy Van Woerkom of my staff be granted the privilege of the floor for the duration of today's session.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, on behalf of Senator Dodd, I ask unanimous consent that Pam Bradley, a fellow in Senator Dodd's office, be granted floor privileges for the duration of consideration of the Genetic Information Nondiscrimination Act.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
